      • getList

        @GetMapping(value="/list")
public PageDTO<PlaygroundShortDTO> getList(@RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=TIME)
                                                                       java.time.LocalTime opening,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=TIME)
                                                                       java.time.LocalTime closing,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> featureCodes,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> sportCodes,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.math.BigDecimal startPrice,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.math.BigDecimal endPrice,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.String searchString,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.Integer pageNum,
                                                                       @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.Integer minRate)
        Returns requested page with playgrounds for current playground filter.
        Parameters:
        opening - LocalTime opening time
        closing - LocalTime closing time
        featureCodes - Collection of String feature codes
        sportCodes - Collection of String sport codes
        startPrice - BigDecimal minimal playground price
        endPrice - BigDecimal maximal playground price
        searchString - String search string
        pageSize - Integer page size
        pageNum - Integer page number
        minRate - Integer minimal playground rate
        Returns:
        PageDTO of PlaygroundShortDTO page with playgrounds

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public PlaygroundDTO get(@PathVariable
                                                     int id)
                                              throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Returns playground by identifier with full information.
        Parameters:
        id - playground identifier
        Returns:
        PlaygroundDTO requested playground
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if requested playground not found

      • getBoard

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}/board")
public PlaygroundBoardDTO getBoard(@PathVariable
                                                                     int id,
                                                                     @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                                                     java.time.LocalDate from,
                                                                     @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                                                     java.time.LocalDate to)
                                                              throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                                                                     ResourceCorruptedException
        Returns requested playground with time grid by start date and end date.
        Parameters:
        id - playground identifier
        from - Date first date of grid
        to - Date last date of grid
        Returns:
        PlaygroundBoardDTO requested time grid
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if requested playground not found
        ResourceCorruptedException - if playground data corrupted

      • check

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}/check")
public ReservationListDTO check(@PathVariable
                                                                  int id,
                                                                  @RequestParam
                                                                  long version,
                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> reservations)
                                                           throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Returns available for reservation times for playground by identifier and collections of checked reservation times.
        Parameters:
        id - playground identifier
        version - playground version
        reservations - Set of String checked reservation times
        Returns:
        ReservationListDTO with available for reservation times
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if requested playground not found

      • reserve

        @PostMapping(value="/{id}/reserve")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> reserve(@PathVariable
                                                                                                            int id,
                                                                                                            @RequestBody @Validated
                                                                                                            ReservationListDTO reservationListDTO)
                                                                                                     throws UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                                                                                            ResourceNotFoundException,
                                                                                                            ResourceCannotCreateException
        Reserve playground for authorize user by sent datetime and returns order location.
        Parameters:
        id - playground identifier
        reservationListDTO - ReservationListDTO reservation data
        Returns:
        new order URI
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedAccessException - if authorization is missing
        ResourceNotFoundException - if requested playground not found
        ResourceCannotCreateException - if reservation cannot create

      • update

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> update(@PathVariable
                                                                                                  int id,
                                                                                                  @RequestBody @Validated(value=PlaygroundDTO.UpdateCheck.class)
                                                                                                  PlaygroundDTO playgroundDTO)
                                                                                           throws UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                                                                                  ForbiddenAccessException,
                                                                                                  ResourceNotFoundException,
                                                                                                  ResourceCannotUpdateException,
                                                                                                  ResourceOptimisticLockException
        Update playground by id.
        Parameters:
        id - playground identifier
        playgroundDTO - PlaygroundDTO playground data
        Returns:
        no content
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedAccessException - if authorization is missing
        ForbiddenAccessException - if user don't have permission to update this playground
        ResourceNotFoundException - if playground not found
        ResourceCannotUpdateException - if playground cannot update
        ResourceOptimisticLockException - if playground was already updated
